ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable environment variables.

APP_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

API_TOKEN.description: Get this value from http://antiddos.systems! Please do not steal

CARBON_DRIVER.description: ChromeDriver location for selenium based modules.

CARBON_BIN.description: Google Chrome (or) Chromium binary location for selenium based modules.

SPAMWATCH_API.description: Get this value from https://t.me/SitiSchu! Please do not steal, group for support https://t.me/SpamWatchSupport

ALIVE_NAME.description: Name to show in .alive message, Now very important do fill all the values of this form for better UserBot functionning.

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

HU_STRING_SESSION.description: Get this value by running python3 GenerateStringSession.py locally

BOTLOG.description: Incase you want to turn off logging, put this to false

PRIVATE_GROUP_BOT_API_ID.description: Send .g_id in any group to fill this value.

PRIVATE_CHANNEL_BOT_API_ID.description: Send .g_id in any channel to fill this value. ReQuired for @Manuel15 inspiration to work!

TMP_DOWNLOAD_DIRECTORY.description: This is required for the plugins involving the file system.

G_BAN_LOGGER_GROUP.description: Send .g_id in any group with all your administration bots (added)

TG_GLOBAL_ALBUM_LIMIT.description: How many media should appear when you do a .google image search? (setting a low value is preferred)

TG_BOT_TOKEN_BF_HER.description: Obtain a Telegram bot token by contacting @BotFather

TG_BOT_USER_NAME_BF_HER.description: Obtain a Telegram bot @username by contacting @BotFather

NO_P_M_SPAM.description: Set to True if you want to block users that are spamming your PMs.

MAX_FLOOD_IN_P_M_s.description: Define the number of consecutive messages a new user can send to your P.M. This should be a valid Integer.

NC_LOG_P_M_S.description: set to True if you want to log PMs to your PM_LOGGR_BOT_API_ID

PM_LOGGR_BOT_API_ID.description: send .g_id in any channel to forward all your NEW PMs to this group

NO_OF_BUTTONS_DISPLAYED_IN_H_ME_CMD.description: Number of rows of modules that needs to be displayed in the .helpme command, max is 9

COMMAND_HAND_LER.description: specify command handler that should be used for the plugins. Get it from "https://del.dog/ahekirewim.txt" or else This should be a valid "regex" pattern

TZ.description: set your default time zone for time related features to work correctly. Value should match the string here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones

DATA_DIRECTORY.description: I dunno y is it for but it is necessary for my repo.

PM_LOGGR_BOT_API_ID.description: Type .g_id in private channel and add that value here.

OPEN_LOAD_KEY.description: I dunno but my repo needs it, u can type 100.

TELE_GRAM_2FA_CODE.description: Your Telegram 2FA code as a string
